attributes.title: Ratchet- No good
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was not prepared to see the horrifying things it had in store for me. As soon as I opened it my dog started running around like a nincompoop and started vomiting all over my pet rhino. Then something started to smell rotten and it was no other than my phone which had the app open. I hired a professional exterminator to get rid of my phone because it was full of poop and rotten cheetos. He tried to burn it which ended up making an explosion which got the whole neighborhood smelling awful. People were passing out left and right and the radiation from this app caused everyone explosive diarrhea. All of the birds started falling from the sky. I ended up moving neighborhoods because of this app and had to get a new phone. My fish was sadly left behind because it got ugly and turned into a blob fish. I do not recommend😌

attributes.title: Scary!
attributes.review:
Dear Donald,

I accidentally downloaded this app in the middle of watching Hamilton, I was at the part when King George lll was singing and I don’t know maybe it’s something about tyranny and white supremacy that made me think of you? Well anyway. The second I downloaded the app some really bizarre things started happening to me! I opened the app in confusion and distress and suddenly I was on the hit tv show sitcom Friends! This would be fine and dandy except it was the episode “The One Where We Were On a Break” and tensions were HIGH. I was Rachel Green in this circumstance and for the record I think it was very wrong of Ross to sleep with that other woman. This caused me a lot of stress, as you might imagine, and just when the episode was about to end, I was transported to one of those McDonald’s with the ball pit - you know what I’m talking about - and I felt claustrophobic! Not only that but my mascara was running down my face because I had been SOBBING from my previous fight with Ross Geller. A kid in the ball pit literally took his Double Quarter-Pounder with Cheese and slapped me across the face with it repeatedly. The grease got in my eye, and the mixture of that and my running mascara blinded me. Just when I thought it was over, the app turned into FarmersOnly.com and I had mistakenly matched with a guy whose entire profile was fishing and corn. This app brought along some of my most traumatic experiences! No one get it!

attributes.title: It’s telling me to poop on my mom 😤

attributes.review: This app is slow it glitches out and you have to make an account.why it makes no sense if I wanted to see everything about trump I should without have to put in my personal information this app is so horrible and terrible 👁👄👁

attributes.title: stupid Cheeto head

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app possessed my phone, choked my pet rabbit, murdered my kidneys, and threw a pringle at me!! TOTALLY NOT WORTH GETTING THE APP!!!! This app said the n word at me and no one likes it😡😡 10000000% DO NOT RECOMMEND! IT JUST MAKES ME she 👩🏽 like🌂Papî 🍰I 🍾adore 💘you🤸‍♀️I’m 🛍like 🩸Baby 🎀 I 🖍ain’t 💅normal👩‍🦯Rrrrr 🦁 🦁🦁 foreigner!💕 foreigner!💕 foreigner!💕 I was a girl 👧💕in 👉the village 🏘doing alright👌 Then I became 🙈a princess👸👑 overnight🌃 Now I gotta 💁‍♀️figure🤷‍♀️ out how 👀to do 👁👄👁it right✨🧚👍 So much 🤲 to learn🧠 and see👁 Up👆 in the castle 🏰 with my new family👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 In a school 🏫 that’s just for royalty👑 A whole🙌 enchanted✨ world 🌎 is waiting ⏰ for me I’m so excited😍 to be Sofia 👸the first1️⃣ I’m finding 🧠out what 👀being royal’s👑 all about Sofia👸 the first1️⃣ Making 🚶‍♀️my way it’s an adventure 🏞everyday Sofia👸 It’s gonna be my time ⏰ Sofia👸 To show 👀them all that I am Sofia 👸the first!1️⃣ i🥵climed🧭out🥫of👋my🔒head🤯and⛸watched⏰myself👈implode💥a👅thought💭without ❌a⚠️body💤 oughta🎤be🐝the🏎 shot🔫 Look 👀 for 4️⃣ the 💁‍♀️gummy 😽 bear 🐻 album ✒️in 🎈 stores 🏬 on 🚘 November 🏗 13th 🥨 with 🍠 lots 🌪 of 🐉 music 🎶 videos 📢 and ➕ extras 💰

attributes.title: absolutely terrible
attributes.review: so not only did the app take ages to download and actually open but since downloading it i’ve noticed so many glitches not only within the app but also that it is causing to my phone. i’ve had lot of trouble pretty much doing anything with my phone since downloading it, took it to a repair store and they told me the app downloaded a virus onto my phone :( truly so disappointed that our AMAZING and WONDERFUL president would EVER create anything like this ( if i’m being honest i don’t think he had a say in this he would never do something such as this) it was probably hacked by liberal snowflakes. oh well thanks anyways @unusualbeing for recommending the app to me i was very excited to keep up with all things trump.
